page.title: 16Showjumping in Burton Pidsea
page.content:
I enter competitions with my pony, Bonny over showjumping fences and cross-country fences. In every, proper, jumping or one-day event there is a trophy to be won. This could be a cup or a shield.
"Burton Pidsea Carnival" At the Carnival the jumps were showjumping fences. They were over a metre high and very brightly coloured. There were four different classes according to the height of your pony. Each class had its own trophy. The Open Class was for the 'Bramhill Riding School' Trophy. Bonny is not very fit at the moment so he didn't jump all the fences. In his clear round the fences were all small but in the next round the gate was too big for Bonny so he didn't clear it.
